DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare analgesic efficacy transversus abdominis-plane block bupivicaine versus bupivacaine morphine patient undergo major abdominal cancer surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Transverses Abdominis -Plane Block With Bupivacaine Versus Bupivacaine With Morphine Postoperatively
DOC.detailed_description: This randomized study approve local ethic committee South Egypt Cancer Institute , Assuit University , Egypt write informed consent . This study include approximately 60 ASA I-II cancer patient age range ( 18-60 ) year , weight ( 50- 85 ) kg schedule low abdominal cancer surgery ( abdominal hysterectomy , oophorectomy radical cystectomy ) . Exclude study Patients know drug allergy study drug , significant cardiac , respiratory , renal hepatic disease , coagulation disorder psychiatric illness would interfere perception assessment pain . Preoperatively , patient teach evaluate pain intensity use Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) , score 0-10 ( 0= pain 10=worst pain imaginable ) . Patients randomly assign use online research randomizer two group , 30 patient group : Group 1 : 30 patient receive ultrasound guided transversus abdominis-plane block local anesthetic 20 ml bupivacaine 0.5 % dilute 20 ml saline ( total volume 40 ml ) two divided dos i.e . 20 ml administer side abdominal wall . Group 2 : 30 patient receive ultrasound guided transversus abdominis-plane block local anesthetic 20 ml bupivacaine 0.5 % + 10 mg morphine dilute 20 ml saline ( total volume 40 ml ) two divided dos i.e . 20 ml administer side abdominal wall . Surgery perform standard general anesthesia ultrasound guide TAP block perform induction GA .
